attDef.valDesc: a whitespace-separated list of attribute names

remarks.p: The attribute names listed may include both attributes inherited from a class and those defined explicitly for the associated element. If the atts attribute is not supplied, then descriptions for all non-inherited attributes are listed, along with references to any classes. If an empty string is supplied as the value for the atts attribute, then no description should be displayed.

The description is usually displayed as a label and an item, with any list of values defined for the attribute as an embedded glossary list, No selection among the values is possible. The list of attributes may include some which are inherited by virtue of an element's class membership; descriptions for such attributes may also be retrieved using another specDesc, this time pointing at the relevant class.
